Articles.Content:
Sorry if this is an extremely stupid question -

Does anyone else get the F-02 as a stock ship that comes with the 0.17 update? Just wondering. I'm thinking I might have gotten it as a bug, because it's labeled (Stock) in my game.

Did you have a "F-02" before you updated? If so, when updating, any ships you had before the update get automatially labeled as [stock]. If you want to delete it from your stock folder, just go to the ships directory in the main directory and delete it there.
